rooms.description: A combined living and kitchen space with a modern Brutalist aesthetic. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the West-facing wall enhance natural light and create visual depth.
A spacious master bedroom positioned to ensure Vastu compliance by avoiding direct alignment with the front door. Features a balcony facing east for balance and relaxation.
A dedicated study area that respects privacy while incorporating Brutalist design elements like exposed concrete structures.

openings.description: Large floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and views on the west side.
Main entrance door aligning with Vastu principles ensuring smooth energy flow.
